name: Initial Status Overwritten
description:
When you refresh the page, the statusService.ready hasn't resolve; the status will be set.
When you navigate to the page, the statusService.ready finished; the status will be set immediately, and overwritten by the first $render of the directive content.
The parent is set either way because it's set by the parent controller.
If we add it to the parent controller, we lose the updates from the child (blockedBy, blocking)

Maybe the EMPTY_TASK should be accessible from the createTask controller.
